appName.description: There is no need to press every radio button individually

appDesc.message: Whenever you access a web page, the radio buttons are checked as you set.
appDesc.description: Check and save the radio buttons on the desired web page. Buttons will be checked on every visit.

li2.message: Click 'Save' button, then URL and buttons are saved.

li3.message: If the URL of an website you visit contains below URL, buttons will checked.
